div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1699 Thebes, near Luxor, 1896 (1102) Burial: c. 200 B.C. (Newell) Contents: 68 AE. From excavations, in recess of wall of Ramesseum Ptolemy II: 2 Ptolemy III: 29 Ptolemy IV: 37 Disposition: unknown Quibell, The Ramesseum, Egyptian Research Account (London, 1896), p. 13 â€ Newell, NNM 68 (1935), pp. 64-7
